name: Boat Blasters
description:
Boat Blasters is a 3 player asynchronous co-op game where one player controls a boat and the two others blast away the evil towers trying to take over the sea! Sadly our cannons have been cursed and fire all by themselves. But surely we will persevere!

Controls: (Gamepad only!):

Gun: 

Aim with right stick

Airship:

Strafe with left stick

Turn with right stick
